question:
[Kenneth] was so excited to surprise his son, [Manuel], with the tickets to the playoffs. [Ethel] made a pizza for her son [Henry]. [Henry]'s sister [Leila] tried a piece and liked it. [Larry] is proud that his daughter is such a good student. Her name is [Leila]. [Kenneth] took his son [Gino] to the park to feed the squirrels. [Michele] loves cooking for her son. His name is [Manuel] [Michele] took her sister, [Ethel], out to dinner for her birthday. [Kenneth] was so happy for his brother, [Joseph], getting a promotion. [Kenneth] took his son [Gino] out for ice cream.
Question: How is [Joseph] related to [Larry]?
